title: MEASURE YOUR RING SIZE EASILY AT HOME
description: This may not be the most accurate measurement. but it's one of the simplest ways

steps.step1: 1. Pick a string or floss and wrap it around the base of your finger.
steps.step2: 2. Mark it with a pen and line that up with a ruler, take down the length in milimeters.
steps.step3: 3. Use the table below to know your ring size.

tips.tip1: Tip: Repeat 3-4 times for a more precise measurement. Try not to force your string too tight.
tips.tip2: Measure your fingers at night when they're warm. Fingers tend to shrink in the morning.
